user.help: Add, edit, or remove a user permission. The second argument must be the user's nickserv account NOT thier nick. To find the account name, perform a whois lookup on the user's nick. They must be registered and logged into nickserv to get the account name.

users.help: List all users of a predefined role. The names listed are nickserv account names, NOT nicks.

unban.help: Lifts a ban on a hostname (IP)

teach.help:
Teaches a new command to the bot that anyone can execute.
Variable substitution can be used in the reply in the form of {}, {active operator}, or [passive operator].
Type !operators to get a list of available operators.

forget.help: Removes a command that the bot has learned.

memo.help: Leaves a message for an offline user. They will recieve the message as a PM the next time they join.

notifyme.help: Allows you to be !notify'd by a user when you are offline. A notification will be sent to the email address you provide. *** The email address must be surrounded in quotes!

notify.help: Allows you to notify an offline user by email if they have allowed notifications by email using the !notifyme command.

notifiable.help: Lists users who have allowed themselves to be notified by email.
